Description:
ONE FOR THE FAMILY OFFERING SPACE AND OUTDOOR ROOM
Modern family home built and completed with an array of modern comforts located on a generous allotment of approx. 512M2. Four generous bedrooms, master with walk in robe and double vanities and oversized shower, all additional bedrooms have BIR's, the central bathroom servicing the three bedrooms. Designer kitchen ,stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances overlooking the large living/dining space with timber flooring and a split system to create comfort with central heating ducted throughout the house. Additional formal living space has WWC and provides a separate space for some quiet time or kids rumpus room. Modern comforts are available with remote double garage, security system, a secondary split system in the master bedroom, large undercover entertaining and lovely landscaped gardens allowing generous space for kids or a large adult gathering. Currently leased until August 2020 to long term tenants. Property available to be lived in so you can enjoy the super convenient location to the supermarket and close access to the local amenities of the Bay and the benefit of all the regions finest wineries.

Description:
Bay Views & Lifestyle Plus!
Brand new build sitting pretty in a bayside location that compliments the lifestyle you have been craving in one of the most sought after estates. As you walk up the decked steps to the wide front door realization comes you are entering something special. Smaller living to the right has a built in study nook which would also be perfect for a home office. Flowing on are bedrooms 1 & 2 that both have built in robes. Large central bathroom features a deep luxurious bath to soak away your stresses, a separate shower plus his & hers vanities. Large bedroom 3 has a full ensuite plus 4 built in robes. Moving up the timber stairs finds you in a world of open plan living and bay views. Stylish kitchen has Caesar stone benches, stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher and a huge walk in pantry to accommodate the fridge all topped off by stylish hanging pendant lights. Following the kitchen is the meals area which has sliding doors out to the balcony to make entertaining in these zones a breeze. Also here is a spacious family area that is light filled. Massive master bedroom has every girls dream walk in robe accompanied by another full ensuite again with his and hers vanities. Out the back is an undercover alfresco, low maintenance retainer wall gardens and secure fencing. Plus a double lock up garage with internal access. Additional features are 6 reverse cycle split systems, solar hot water service, 6 star energy rating, 2.7 meter ceilings on both levels & double glazed windows.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Nearly New - Minutes to the beach!
This quality home is only a year old and has been fully landscaped and fitted out, so you do not have to lift a finger. The front landscaping of the home is immaculate, and the street appeal cannot be questioned.
Highlights of this stylish home are four bedrooms all with robes, including a master bedroom with walk in robe and luxurious en-suite and a second guest bedroom with en-suite. There are two separate living areas. The rear of the house has two bedrooms and a lounge room, perfect for kids or teenagers. The main lounge is open plan living with the extensive kitchen including butlers pantry - perfect for entertaining! Double sliding doors allow you to enter the alfresco area which has an impressive deck and pergola. The garden is fully landscaped and has an irrigation system to keep the grass looking luscious all year round.
This well thought out floor plan on 512m2 block is perfect for families, those downsizing or anyone wanting to escape the city.
Nestled in a quiet street that is a short walk to the bay and close by to shops and primary school.
All the hard work has been done for you; this is a stylish home that will not disappoint!

Description:
A Sensational Family Entertainer
Less than four years old, this spacious residence offers contemporary family living upon approx. 726m2! Boasting four indoor living zones, stunning entertaining options, and a large backyard, every inch of this property will astound!
Positioned in a family-friendly community, youll enjoy living within walking distance to public transport, local parklands and the Bay View Shopping Centre. The Drysdale Park and Recreation Reserve is moments away, while nearby schools include Clifton Springs P.S, Bellarine Secondary College and St Ignatius College Geelong. With Curlewis Golf Club and the regions finest wineries virtually on your doorstep, an enviable lifestyle is part of the package. Just jump in the car, and youll soon be in the heart of Geelong.
Showcasing contemporary style, youll love that the interiors feel just like new. Entertainers will be in their element when they lay eyes on the open plan living/dining/kitchen zone, which unites with the north-facing alfresco deck for sensational entertaining options. The front lounge inspires relaxation, while the rumpus room and sitting room will delight children and teens who enjoy their own space. The kitchen perfectly blends style and functionality with stone benchtops, a large walk-in pantry and stainless steel appliances (Miele dishwasher and Westinghouse 900mm oven, gas cooktop, rangehood). Pendant lights make a stylish statement above the island bench, which conveniently doubles as a breakfast bar.
The spacious Master Bedroom creates a private sanctuary for parents with a walk-in robe and luxe en suite, which is graced with a large shower and dual vanity. Three additional bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the main bathroom and separate toilet. The study features built-in cabinetry, while the laundry is complete with ample storage. Other features inc. ducted heating, evaporative cooling, a split-system air conditioner, ceiling fans, walk-in linen press and stone benchtops to both bathrooms.
The secure backyard is wonderfully spacious, while the sandpit will steal the hearts of little ones! The oversized remote double lock-up garage provides storage room, plus a rear roller door that offers additional parking for one vehicle. With something to impress every family member, this home is not to be missed! Inspect without delay!
Insights: 25 View Bella Road, Curlewis VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 40 other 4 bedroom house in Curlewis have recently been sold.

Description:
Affordable Land in Sold Out Stage!
The Feel:
Set in an established neighbourhood within the popular Bay View Estate, comes an exciting opportunity to secure an easy care block an easy walk to first class amenities, shops and beaches.
Build a substantial home with paths to get you to the water or shops in minutes. Whether its for lifestyle or investment you cannot go wrong here!
The Facts:
-448sqm approx. block within popular Bayview Estate neighbourhood
-Stunning master planned community with parks and playgrounds
-One of the last remaining blocks in near sold-out first stage.
-Neighbouring allotment also available offering a total of 958m2!
-Potential for water views from a second level (STCA)
-Safe walking track and pedestrian bridge to Clifton Springs Primary
-2min drive to Bayview Central, 5mins to Drysdale township
-15mins to Geelong CBD and Portarlington Ferry to Melbourne

Description:
Contemporary Quality In The Bayview Estate!
Located in the highly sought after Bayview Estate, this immaculately maintained single level contemporary home, with full render façade, will not disappoint the astute home buyer looking to move into Curlewis and embrace the lifestyle. This home offers 23 squares (approx) of living, a 2 car garage with internal access and is situated on a comparatively large lot size of 576sqm. Incorporating a neutral palette throughout, the home boasts a generous open-plan living and dining area. A stylishly appointed kitchen with a large stainless steel Technika 5 burner oven, Technika dishwasher and rangehood and a stunning island bench (over 2 metres in length), adds the wow factor to this home. Excellent planning has created an expansive family/dining room area that creates that sense of home. With a family friendly design in mind, a second living area/theatre room offers plenty additional space for the growing family. Comprising of 4 bedrooms, the master with a generous walk-in robe and ensuite, whilst the other 3 spacious bedrooms all have built-in robes. A rare additional extra that not many homes in the area have is an amazing 4 metre + side access to the backyard allowing you to be able park and store a caravan and/or boat with ease. The home is connected to the fibre optic network and has the luxury of gas ducted heating throughout and evaporative cooling.
This superbly presented family home is located close to all the lifestyle pursuits that the Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for. With the Percy Cherry Playground & Bayview Central Shopping Centre just around the corner, a walking track to the bay, excellent array of the area's finest schools (public & private) & access to the Bellarine Peninsula's world class restaurants & wineries - all of which enhance the lifestyle appeal of this prestigious location. An inspection is a must to fully appreciate this beautiful home.
Land size: 576sqm approx.

Description:
FABULOUS BLOCK ! READY TO GO ! CHECK FOR BONUSES !
You can see the quality of the neighbourhood, and a great location with parks, school, leisure walks, shopping centre and the bay , all within a short walk from this perfect position. Hop on the Rail Trail track and head to Queenscliff , enjoy the beauty of the Bellarine Penisula walking, cycling or get the train on the weekend. The jetty is closeby as well, walk or stroll, have a swim, enjoy the fishing or picnic at the Dell. A good time to buy and build your dream home or landbank until you are ready knowing you have secured your position now for the future.

Description:
Build your Coastal Dream in this quality location
Located within a few doors from extensive parkland lies an opportunity to build your dream coastal property. With a fully fenced blank canvas of 457m2 (approx.) to work with there will be plenty of space for your new home.
This is a lifestyle location as you walk to the park with walking trails connecting you to the coastline or down to the marina. Not too much further away you will find The Dell where you can swim and soon to be established, The Sunken Gallery living underwater art exhibition.
Located close to all that the Bellarine has to offer, including wineries, beaches, schools and golf courses, this property is also 10 minutes from the Portarlington- Melbourne ferry. Commuting to Melbourne CBD has never been easier. Geelong city is mere 30 mins away which offers plenty of schooling options for families seeking a seachange.

Description:
SERIOUSLY NOTHING TO DO !
State Government now permitting public OFI's for groups of 20 people, social distancing still applies.
We regret that residents from Metropolitan Melbourne or Mitchell Shire must not attend an open for inspection at this stage. Please contact the agent to organise a virtual inspection.
I knew I was going to be impressed with this home when I arrived and saw a double door entry with Australiana stained glass windows.
Usually when you look at an established home there are things that need to be done. Not at this address. There are many features to appeal at 80 Coriyule Road, Curlewis. Firstly, it is not your run of the mill layout that is common with other builders. An out of town builder has offered an alternative open plan that flows well and allows for separate living zones. Careful planning by the vendors has incorporated indoor outdoor areas where the external undercover alfresco boasts full kitchen sink with hot and cold running water. The built in BBQ is connected to natural gas and the home has a 6 star rating and includes solar, water tank and some double glazed windows.
A corner block with rear access has a high carport to protect your caravan, boat or trailer.
An inspection of this home will expose the many other features that make this home suit the relaxed lifestyle we have all become accustomed to.
The Bellarine Peninsula provides the balance and lifestyle to work, live and play. Under normal circumstances we have a plethora of restaurants, cafes and take away outlets. Even in the current environment you can still enjoy getting out for walks along the waters edge or along our very extensive rail trail. Bike riders are also making use of these facilities.
Don't delay this home won't be on the market long just move in and enjoy.

Description:
Stunning family home - FHOG eligible.
Located in the heart of Curlewis just minutes from everything, this high quality home is under 5 years old and perfect for the growing family, retiree or holiday maker.
Set on a substantial allotment of 528m2 (approx.).
1st home owners are eligible for the $20,000 FHOG.
Curlewis offers a short trip to a number of the Peninsula's best attractions, including a number of quality golf courses, award winning wineries, historical sites, great beaches, regular markets, annual events AND Queenscliff where you can jump on the ferry and enjoy a day trip on the Mornington Peninsula or Portarlington offering a ferry to Melbourne.
With an intelligent design that encompasses open spaces, natural light, zoned living and more, this stunning home will leave you wanting for nothing.
Upon entry you will be met by the well designed lay out that begins with a master bedroom with walk in robes and ensuite at the front of the residence as well as a carpeted living area adjacent, creating an independent living zone just for the parents.
Continuing through we are met by the light filled, open plan heart of the property. The kitchen is fully equipped with a stone top island bench, stainless SMEG appliances, dishwasher, walk in pantry and breakfast bar. The living / dining area includes additional study nook and opens through stacker doors onto the undercover alfresco creating the ultimate indoor / outdoor entertainment experience.
Accessed via a separate hall, 3 generous bedrooms with built in robes, a central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry complete the internal layout.
Ducted heating and evaporative cooling control the climate year round and quality fittings are dotted throughout the home.
The double garage has remote panel lift door and rear roller door access, whilst the rear yard is raised with established low maintenance landscapes.
There is simply nothing to do but move in and start enjoying this fantastic home.
Call Dion on 0424 940 629 for your opportunity to learn more and book an inspection.

Description:
Curlewis luxury at its finest - plus the priceless bay view
The home is currently available with a 6 month leaseback at $7,200 per month to the Baywater Estate as a Land Sales Office. However vacant possession would be considered.
With a truly spectacular panoramic view of Port Phillip Bay that can never be built out, this ultra-luxurious, two-storey contemporary home presents a rare opportunity to establish a unique and enviable lifestyle.
Located on Curlewis' new Beach Vista Drive, the home has a driveway to a double-lock-up garage and a security intercom at the front door. Entry is to a stylish ground-floor lounge plus access to a south facing covered deck. A generous laundry has an extra annex with shelves for storage. There are three bedrooms on this level - all with built-in robes, a powder room with a WC and vanity, and a main bathroom with grey feature tiles, a shower, bath and vanity. There's also a home theatre/lounge, with a projector, large screen, and surround sound already installed. Now that's entertainment!
Upstairs is a breathtaking, light-filled open-plan lounge/dining/kitchen area, with views on three sides, plus a front balcony that showcases the thrilling vista of sparkling water and the You Yangs in the background. There is a built-in large-screen television and river-stone gas fire to settle in around. Sliding glass doors open onto a delightful covered deck with a ceiling fan where alfresco dining is an irresistible option. The dream kitchen has a large 60mm thick Caesarstone serving bench/breakfast bar with a Westinghouse dishwasher. There's also a Westinghouse electric oven with a 6-burner gas cooktop, and rangehood, a walk-in pantry and even a built-in wine rack. A second powder room sits adjacent to the magnificent master bedroom which boasts a generous walk-in robe, and a sparkling ensuite with twin basins, bath, shower and separate WC.
Naturally the home has ducted heating and cooling to provide comfort for all seasons. The large back garden has a well-kept expanse of lawn and awaits a creative gardener to add appropriate flora to complement this superb family home, or maybe a protected space for a pool.
- 2-storey luxury home with spectacular panoramic bay views
- Groundfloor lounge, theatre, 3 bedrooms, bathroom, laundry
- Upstairs - stunning lounge/dining/kitchen, balcony, and deck
- Kitchen with Westinghouse appliances and walk-in pantry
- Master bedroom with walk-in robe and ultra-modern ensuite
- DLUG, ducted heating/cooling, 2 powder rooms, security system

Description:
Modern lifestyle in perfect location
Contemporary and fresh, this home is ideally situated within an easy walk of Curlewis Shopping Centre.
A well appointed open plan modern kitchen, dining & lounge with an abundance of storage space.
Enjoy the peace & comfort of the large lounge with reverse cycle air conditioner.
The spacious king sized master bedroom with modern ensuite & walk in robe. The three other bedrooms have built in robes with plenty of storage room.
Central heating throughout.
A Large double garage with plenty of room for a workshop and two cars will fit comfortably.
A modern home close to all amenities in the Curlewis and Drysdale area. Walking distance to the Curlewis shopping precinct and public transport only a stone throw away makes this a home a must to inspect.
Only minutes away from the Jetty Road boat ramp & walks along the cliff tops & beaches, this magnificent home will be highly sought after by the astute buyer for an ideal low maintenance investment property.
You are able to view this property 7 days a week by private inspection. We have created an environment to look and purchase safely. Please contact us to arrange a time to do so.

Description:
Family Home With Spacious Backyard
The Feel
This 4-bedroom home in the desired location of Coriyule Estate, Curlewis, is customised to include quality electricals throughout, with a clearly zoned floorplan providing dual living zones to suit a familys needs. North west orientation captures the afternoon sunshine, while protected outdoor living flows directly onto a substantial backyard for kids & pets. Take your pick of two parks within an easy stroll, & enjoy the convenience of being located just a few kms from the local Primary School & shopping centre.
The Facts
-Quality custom-built brick veneer residence by local Boutique Homes
-Recently built with 2.55m ceilings & well-proportioned open plan living
-Inviting entry with Natural Oak timber laminate floors throughout & carpet to bedrooms
-Modern, classic kitchen with caesarstone benches & floor to ceiling pantry
-Stainless steel Westinghouse appliances; 900mm oven, gas hob
-Sunny living & meals area flows to outdoor area via sliding glass doors
-Covered alfresco a great place for glorious afternoon sunsets
-Fully fenced yard with beautiful lawn, low maintenance for lock up & leave lifestyle
-Ducted heating & cooling + powerful 10kW SSAC, & ceiling fans in bedrooms
-Master bedroom with Spotted Gum inspired feature wall, tv point, WIR & en suite
-Zoned wing to 3 more bedrooms & central bathroom (vanity, bath, shower, sep toilet)
-2nd living room with east aspect; versatile tv room, lounge, rumpus or study
-Sparkling Bay views on arrival, with landscaped cactus garden
-OSP + RC DLUG with internal & rear yard access & exposed aggregate driveway/perimeter paths
-Electricians own home; generous data & power points throughout plus Foxtel cabling
-Superb location; 2mins drive to Safeway shopping centre & close to schools & amenities
The Owner Loves:
Being an electrician, this home is customised to include data points & quality electricals throughout, including Foxtel cabling & a powerful 10Kw SSAC, to satisfy all the familys needs. The layout works really well to allow two separate living areas & zoned sleeping quarters for the children.

Description:
Splendor in all Forms
Finished to a high standard with no expenses spared, from stone throughout to custom pendants this home will have you crawling back for more.
Located at the top end of Oceania Drive, with Bay views from the street, surrounded by well-kept homes and just moments to the Bay. With astute design in mind 140 Oceania Drive will tick all the boxes; a fantastic holiday retreat, permanent residence or holiday let equipped with all the mod cons, you can't ask for more.
Upon entry you are greeted with landscaped gardens, private entry stepping into a wide feature hallway. The fore of the home hosts the master suite with custom front windows, lavish walk-in robe complete with a full ensuite including floor to ceiling tiles, aluminum capped joins, shower niche, stone vanity, Vito Bertoni black tapware, heat lamps and sliding door access to the gardens.
A large theater room with double doors and garage access across the hall complete the impressive entry to this home. It does get better though, the open plan kitchen, meals (north facing) and second living enjoy lofted ceilings adorned with custom lighting and windows, beautiful sheer curtains, and stacker door access to both outdoor entertaining areas. The galley style kitchen is placed in the center of the room making entertaining a breeze. The kitchen enjoys, stone benchtops, in-bench black ceramic sink, 900mm gas cooking, stainless steel appliances, feature splash back all complete with a decked-out butler's pantry for the ultimate convenience.
The rear wing is home to bedrooms 2,3 and 4 all with built-in robes, a central bathroom with free standing bath, plantation shutters and the same luxe features following through. A large separate toilet, linen press and large laundry also enjoying stone benchtops, built-in trough, and cabinetry with yard access.
It's all about first impressions and this entrance makes a statement, with side gate access to the back yard where you will find two entertaining areas, retained gardens and low maintenance bliss complete with outdoor power and colourbond fencing.
Features of 140 Oceania Drive are in abundance including vinyl plank floor coverings, upgraded carpets, custom pendants, Vito Bertoni custom black tapware, stone benchtops, custom windows and window furnishings throughout, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, stacker sliding doors fitted with flyscreen's, NBN fiber to the home and a double lock up garage with remote/internal/external access.
And there you have it folks a feature packed home, in a revered seaside location all at an affordable price point. An inspection is a must to completely appreciate what this home has to offer.

Description:
Contemporary Living in Cul-De-Sac Locale
Offering incredible value for money and tucked away in a private Cul-De-Sac locale, this neat and low maintenance home will suit those looking for a smart first home, ideal investment or downsize.
Light and bright throughout, the open floor plan allows for practical family living with room for all. The kitchen comprises SS appliances, an abundance of storage and stone benchtops, while overlooking the free-flowing living/dining, offering effortless entertaining. The master bedroom sits at the fore of the home with walk-in-robe and ensuite, while the 3 remaining bedrooms all host built-in-robes. A central family bathroom with shower, tiled in bath and vanity, separate toilet and laundry complete this cleverly zoned footprint.
The backyard offers a low maintenance terraced garden, with space and potential to further improve and add your own mark!
Additional features include - ducted heating, split system cooling and DLUG with internal and external access.
Location is key and this home has you on the doorstep of Curlewis Shopping Center, public transport, local parks, schools and the boat ramp, with the remainder of the Bellarine's beaches, golf courses, eateries and wineries at your fingertips. Why wait? The time to make your move is now!

Description:
Modern family home
An appealing street facade of brick, render & timber will make you the envy of all your friends & family.
With two living areas comprising of a front formal lounge & a spacious open plan kitchen, dining & living room.
The kitchen with a stainless steel 900mm oven & 5 burner gas cooktop, dishwasher, island preparation bench & plenty of pot draws will make entertaining a delight.
Step out to the northerly facing alfresco which beckons all year round entertaining & with eaves all round offers extra protection from the sun & rain.
The spacious master bedroom has both walk in robe & a built in robe looks out to the backyard & with sliding door access to the alfresco gives a resort style feeling. The ensuite is spacious & has a separate toilet.
The second & third bedrooms are generous & located either side of the central bathroom.
All the bedrooms are located via the private passageway.
A larger than normal double garage means you won't bang your car doors or maybe utilise the extra space to store the camping gear.
The property has concreted side access to store your boat, caravan or backup your tradie trailer & ute securely behind double wooden gates.
Your family will love the size of the backyard with plenty of room on this 569 sqm parcel of land.
You will not tire of pulling into the drive of this appealing family home.

Description:
Urgent Sale Required - Genuine Offers Considered!
Just completed and beautifully presented is this prime example of modern luxurious living in a very attractive new development in Curlewis. With parklands and amenities close by and quick access to the Bellarine Coast this property and location is sure to impress.
On entry the sheer width of the passage way makes grand statement. To the left of entry is the master bedroom with expansive walk in robe and double vanity ensuite with large shower recess. Walk further into the house to discover the first secluded living area before being blown away by the beautiful open plan kitchen, main living and dining area. The warm tones of the floorboards simply look magnificent in this expansive central hub of the home. The kitchen bench is substantial in size and the walk in 900mm oven and gas stove top present a benchmark of quality. Three further bedrooms and bathroom with tub adorn the northern wing and rear of the house. A covered outdoor area will make the perfect retreat for summer days. Ducted heating and evaporative cooling channel throughout.
Nearby Bayview Central is home to food options, Woolworths Supermarket, BWS, Medical facilities & Chemist. Pratt Reserve is also just down the road to take the dog for a walk and kids to stretch their legs in the playground. Luxury modern living in a prime location awaits for the first lucky owner of this magnificent home.

Description:
AFFORDABLE ! FIRST HOME BUYERS, DOWNSIZE OR INVEST WELL.
First home buyers get the added advantage of the stamp duty savings. So close to the shops, parklands, Curlewis Golf Club and schools as well as immediate access to Geelong and the delights of the Bellarine Peninsula....enjoy the summertime bliss. No.15 has a spacious lounge room which is adjacent to kitchen and dining ,all adjoining an undercover outdoor entertaining area. Four bedrooms (master with ensuite and WIR ), BIR'S in other 3, central bathroom , separate toilet and laundry. Features include walk in pantry, dishwasher, central heating and split system. The block 525m2 allows for a generous leafy backyard, double garage with access to rear. Ring for inspection or visit our open homes.

Description:
North Facing, Build Your Dream
Perfectly positioned and situated just a short drive to the beach this 525m2 parcel of land offering endless possibilities in a highly sought after area. Take advantage of the bay views with this titled parcel offering you the opportunity for immediate commencement. Close to all that Curlewis and the Bellarine has to offer, only a 20 minute drive to Geelong, close to all the wineries, schools, shops, beaches and fishing with more expansive shopping facilities nearby in Drysdale.
Great block with a frontage of 17m and a depth of 32m is an ideal site for those owner occupiers, retirees, developers-builders or astute investors looking for a property with multiple options.
This is your chance to invest, the opportunity to build your dream home awaits, this could be the land you have been waiting for.

Description:
Prime Location Close To Everything!
The Feel:
Waste no time moving in and living life! This beautifully presented 3-bedroom home is located in an established street in a popular area, steps from parkland & only 600m walk to Curlewis Shopping Village. A low-maintenance backyard & well-designed floorplan with a spacious kitchen & living zone will suit families or downsizers, appealing to those looking to call Brompton Avenue home, or as a portfolio addition.
The Facts:
-Neat brick veneer family home with outlook to community parkland
-Pleasant first impression of neat well-kept lawn & covered portico entrance with timber deck
-Open plan layout with sunny north & west outlooks from kitchen, living & meals area
-Sliding doors to both aspects reveal large wraparound timber decks & lawn for outdoor living
-Light, bright home with timber laminate floors to high traffic areas + carpet to all bedrooms
-Galley style kitchen with caesarstone island bench, ample storage & floor to ceiling pantry
-Quality s/s appliances; 900mm electric Smeg oven, 6 burner gas cooktop, Asko dishwasher
-Impressive Master with double vanity en suite, walk-in robe
-2 more zoned bedrooms with BIRs & adjacent hallway storage
-Large family bathroom with deep bath & shower, shower & separate toilet
-Ducted heating & evaporative cooling throughout
-Double glazed windows throughout & seasonal passive design for heating/cooling
-Exposed aggregate concrete driveway to RC DLUG, with internal & rear door access
-Fantastic location close to shops, facilities, Reserve & within the ever-popular school precinct
The Owner Loves
We love the central location and easy access to everything we need, with walking trails to Woolworths (600m), Aldi & Coles (2km) and the beach and Reserves all nearby.
